text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes Geez. Looks like the Koreans work even harder.

S. Korea and the USA had their first confirmed Covid19 case on January 21. 

Both are populous, free-market, well-educated countries.

Covid19 deaths as of today: 

S. Korea: 242

USA: 54,  161

Someone’s asleep at the switch, huh?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
